author: Simon Difford
description: A sidecar-like cocktail with a good balance between sweet (triple sec) and sour (lemon juice), fortified by cognac and smoothed by Lillet Blanc.
name: Hey Hey Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
